name: Ears
tagline: Easy Api in Rust to play Sounds
body:
### About ears

Easy API in Rust to play Sounds.

__ears__ is build on top of `OpenAL` and `SndFile` and is design to use sound in your Rust application in a simple way.

### Features

* 3D audio features thanks to `OpenAL`
* Lot of supported audio format thanks to `SndFile`
* Playing sounds ( short audio sample stored in memory )
* Playing musics ( longer audio sample )
* Record sounds
* KISS: just to LOC to play a sound
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
